### [Tender Announcement]
# Janitorial Services for RCMP Stettler Detachment
#### [callNumber] M5000-21-1679/A
#### [issueDate] 2023-07-20
#### [closeDate] 2023-08-18T16:00:00

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is requesting proposals for janitorial services at the RCMP Stettler Detachment in Alberta, Canada. The contract period will be for two years with an option to extend it for two additional one-year periods.

### [Contract Overview]
- **Service Requirements:** The successful bidder will be responsible for providing labor, materials, equipment, transportation, and daily site supervision necessary to provide janitorial services in accordance with the Invitation to Tender (ITT) and Annex “A” – Janitorial Services.
- **Frequency of Cleaning:** Cleaning will be required five days a week.
- **Security Requirements:** The contract will require a minimum Level 2 security clearance.

### [Evaluation Criteria]
- **Bidder Selection:** Bidders must comply with all requirements of the bid solicitation to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.
- **Site Visit:** A site visit is being offered. Bidders must refer to the Invitation to Tender (ITT) for additional details.
- **Language:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### [Important Dates]
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-08-18T16:00:00
- **Contact Information:** Qyitayo Ziwa, [qyitayo.ziwa@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto;qyitayo.ziwa@rcmp-grc.gc.ca), 1-639-625-4151

### [Additional Notes]
- **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
- **Notice Type:** This is a Request for Proposal (RFP).
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open bidding.
- **Integrity Regime:** The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
- **Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS):** Canada will make available Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), bid solicitations, and related documents for download through GETS.
